Package controller

Class ApplicationController

java.lang.Object
controller.ApplicationController
public class ApplicationController extends Object
Controller class that manages internship applications.

Provides operations for students to apply, withdraw and accept internships, for company representatives to accept applications, and for career center staff to review withdrawal requests.

  • Method Details

    • createApplication

      public static void createApplication(Student student, Internship internship)
      Controller class that manages internship applications.

      Provides operations for students to apply, withdraw and accept internships, for company representatives to accept applications, and for career center staff to review withdrawal requests.

    • requestWithdrawal

      public static void requestWithdrawal(Student student, Internship internship)
      Requests withdrawal from an existing application for the given internship on behalf of the student, updating the application status accordingly.
      Parameters:
      student - the student requesting withdrawal
      internship - the internship from which the student wants to withdraw

    • reviewWithdrawal

      public static void reviewWithdrawal(CareerCenterStaff staff, Student student, Internship internship, boolean approve)
      Reviews a student's withdrawal request for a specific internship and either approves or rejects it on behalf of a career center staff member.
      Parameters:
      staff - the staff member reviewing the withdrawal request
      student - the student who requested the withdrawal
      internship - the internship associated with the application
      approve - true to approve the withdrawal, false to reject it

    • acceptInternship

      public static void acceptInternship(Student student, Internship internship)
      Allows a student to accept an internship offer, provided that the application has already been accepted by the company representative.
      Parameters:
      student - the student accepting the internship
      internship - the internship being accepted

    • acceptApplicationByCompanyRep

      public static void acceptApplicationByCompanyRep(CompanyRep rep, Internship internship, Student student)
      Allows a company representative to accept a student's application for a specific internship, if the application is still pending.
      Parameters:
      rep - the company representative accepting the application
      internship - the internship the student applied for
      student - the student whose application is being accepted
